title: opposition
comment: The act of resisting individuals and forces. Scripture stresses the reality of sin and evil in the world and calls upon believers to resist them. Scripture also points to the existence of evil forces that oppose God and identifies them so that believers may recognise and resist them. These forces were evident in the ministry of Jesus Christ.

children.title: opposition, to sin and evil
children.comment: Believers are called upon to opppose all that is hostile to God's purposes in the world.

children.title: Examples of failure to oppose evil
Examples of unwise opposition to evil
Concern for the honour and glory of God
Concern for the good of others
opposition, to God's person and work
children.comment: The forces of evil are antagonistic towards God, his people and his work, and believers must oppose them.

children.title: Targets of opposition from evil forces
